text: Jabalpur or Jubbulpore is a city in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. It is close to the Nerbudda river. Jabalpur is one of the largest cities in the state of Madhya Pradesh. It is located at a major road - rail junction and is also a military headquarters.Jabalpur; Encyclop√¶dia Britannica ==Source== Category:Cities in Madhya Pradesh
title: Jabalpur
